text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to turn off bold text on an iphone?
text.Response A: To turn off bold text on an iPhone, go to Settings > General > Accessibility > Bold Text and turn off the switch.
text.Response B: Yes, it’s easy to turn off bold text on an iphone!  First, open the “Settings” app on your iphone, and then tap on the “General” tab at the top of the screen.  Next, scroll down to the “Accessibility” section, and then tap on the “Display & Brightness” button.  On this screen, you’ll see a slider for “Bold Text”.  Just slide this all the way to the left to turn off bold text on your iphone.

meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

1088.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to turn off bold text on an iphone?

Response A

To turn off bold text on an iPhone, go to Settings > General > Accessibility > Bold Text and turn off the switch.

Response B

Yes, it’s easy to turn off bold text on an iphone! First, open the “Settings” app on your iphone, and then tap on the “General” tab at the top of the screen. Next, scroll down to the “Accessibility” section, and then tap on the “Display & Brightness” button. On this screen, you’ll see a slider for “Bold Text”. Just slide this all the way to the left to turn off bold text on your iphone.
